description: Release Managers: Kapil Arya, Anand Mazumdar

issues.title: Add support for SemVer build and prerelease labels to stout.
Investigate increasing protobuf protocol message size limit.
git commit-msg hook completely breaks fixup commits.
Implement `sleep` in Windows
Segfault in ProcessTest.Spawn with GCC 6
sandbox uri does not work outisde mesos http server
The filesystem/linux isolator does not set the permissions of the host_path.
`GTEST_IS_THREADSAFE` guards prevent many tests from being run on Windows.
`flags::parse` assumes the filesystem is rooted at '/'
`net::links` is not implemented on Windows.
Source tree contains compiled protobuf source
Compile warning in GMock: "binding dereferenced null pointer to reference"
Docker executor hangs forever if `docker stop` fails.
Make sure compilation configuration is propagated correctly to third party dependencies
Audit the use of UNICODE-related code paths
Improve health checks validation.
Launching two tasks with the same Docker image simultaneously may cause a staging dir never cleaned up
Executors don't use glog for logging.
HTTP API responses can crash the master.
The linux filesystem isolator should set mode and ownership for host volumes.
Agent should prefer LOG(FATAL) over EXIT().
CMake does not define `GIT_SHA` etc. in build.cpp
Metrics about used/allocated shared resources are incorrect accounted.
Use of `GTEST_IS_THREADSAFE` in asserts is problematic.
Need to fix resource check in long-lived framework
CNI isolator should mount network related /etc/* files in readonly mode
CMake < 3.8.0 cannot find VS2017 tools
Remove thread_local workaround on OSX
Running DOCKER images in Mesos Container Runtime without `linux/filesystem` isolation enabled renders host unusable
Build failure with glibc 2.12.
Flaky tests in NestedMesosContainerizerTest
Mesos 1.2.0 crashes with pre-1.0 Mesos agents.
Resources::apply(const Offer::Operation&) should fail when a shared persistent volume can't be removed

HierarchicalAllocatorTest.NestedRoleQuota is flaky
webui display of framework resources is confusing
Fix the duration.hpp warning
Flaky test HierarchicalAllocatorTest.NestedRoleDRF
Recent Docker versions cannot be parsed by stout.
Could not copy the sandbox path on WebUI
Provisioner recover should not always assume 'rootfses' dir exists.
Restrict capabilities to only the bounding set.
VersionTest.ParseInvalid aborts on Windows.
The /debug:fastlink linker option is not being respected
Remove need to set environment variable `PreferredToolArchitecture`
Build error on Windows when using "int" for a file descriptor
Add a metric for the network size of replicas for the registry.
MasterAllocatorTest/0.ResourcesUnused is flaky
Basic fetcher success metrics
Volume secret isolator breaks Windows build
MasterAllocatorTest/0.FrameworkExited is flaky
Allow "old" executors with half-open connections to be preserved during agent upgrade / restart.
Specifying an unbundled dependency can cause build to pick up wrong Boost version
ASF Jenkins build errors out on missing 'python-six' dependency
libprocess build is broken
CMake files incompatible with multi-configuration generators
Mesos slave stucks
The command `false` does not exist on Windows
Docker containerizer fails to set sandbox logs ownership correctly.
Docker image with universal containerizer does not work if WORKDIR is missing in the rootfs.
Reservation Refinement: Update the resources logic.
Documentation regarding TASK_LOST is misleading
Update the agent to use the new resource format
Update the master to use the new resource format.
Update the test utilities to produce the resources in the new format
Let frameworks specify the task bounding capabilities.
Update the generic Protobuf to JSON facility to not output deprecated fields.
V1 Operator API update for reservation refinement.
Libprocess can crash on malformed request paths for libprocess messages.
The agent can crash when an unknown executor tries to register.
Prevent reserve/create operations with refined reservations on non-capable agents.
Mesos fails to exec a custom executor when no shell is used
Master updates registry for reregistering agents even when they haven't been unreachable
Fix agent downgrade for reservation refinement
Mesos 1.2.0 agent crashes Mesos 1.4.0 master
PersistentVolumeEndpointsTest.ReserveAndSlaveRemoval test is flaky
Java HTTP adapter crashes JVM when leading master disconnects.
The master crashes when state endpoint is hit during a task authorization.
Mesos Agent Sends TASK_KILL status update to Master, and still launches task
Mesos failed to build on Windows due to error C2039: 'parse': is not a member of 'mesos::internal::protobuf'
`log.LearnedMessage` could be rejected due to being sent from '@0.0.0.0:0'
Stout doesn't build standalone.
Website ruby deps do not bundle on macOS
MasterTest.KillUnknownTask is failling due to a bug in `net::IPv4::ANY()`
libprocess initializes to bind to random port if --ip is not specified
Persistent volume might not be mounted if there is a sandbox volume whose source is the same as the target of the persistent volume.
Copy-n-paste error in slave/main.cpp
Eliminate extra process abort in a subprocess watchdog
Agent failed to recover due to mount namespace leakage in Docker 1.12/1.13
Hide per-platform subprocess headers.
Framework might not receive status update when a just launched task is killed immediately
Mesos failed with error c2102 when build in conformance mode (/permissive-)
LIBPROCESS_IP isn't passed on to the fetcher
Hard-coded forward slash breaks windows docker container task in DC/OS
mesos-execute has incorrect example TaskInfo in help string
CreateProcess wrapper's error message is bad
Resource refinement does downgrade task.executor.resources in LAUNCH_GROUP handler.
Sandbox_path volume does not have ownership set correctly.
Resource refinement is not applied to tasks in completed_frameworks.
The rlimits and linux/capabilities isolators should support nested containers
Launching a nested container with namespace/pid isolation, with glibc < 2.25, may deadlock the LinuxLauncher and MesosContainerizer
Agent may drop pending kill task status updates.
Agent may process a kill task and still launch the task.
Build fails with `--disable-zlib` or `--with-zlib=DIR`
Agent fails assertion during request to '/state'
Scheduler hang when registration fails.
Track fetcher task success and failures
Ordering dependency between 'linux/capabilities' and 'docker/runtime' isolator.
Master WebUI not working in Chrome.
Fix communication between old masters and new agents.
Abnormal termination of default executor can cause MesosContainerizer::destroy to fail.
OOM due to LibeventSSLSocket send incorrectly returning 0 after shutdown.
Prevent pre-1.0 agents from registering with 1.3+ master.
Support private registry credential per container.
Automatically publish website through CI
Add support for accounting only mode in XFS isolator.
define WSTRINGIFY behaviour on Windows
Combine test helpers into one single binary.
Allow agents to re-register post a host reboot
The default executor should support kill policies
Asynchronous dir removal in agent GC
Inherit Environment from parent container when launching DEBUG container.
Task status updates caused by task health update do not set appropriate reason.
Disallow (re-)registration attempts by old agents.
Cleanup tech debt in master for old agents
Update webui to remove orphan tasks
Launch docker containers with --cpus instead of cpu-shares
Frameworks should be able to (re)register in suppressed state
Health checker duplicates a lot of checker's functionality.
Upgrade Mesos to build with proto3.
Add a test with multiple tasks and checks for the default executor.
Add a ReviewBot for testing patches on Windows
Set MESOS_SANDBOX in debug containers.
Upgrade vendored GMock / GTest
Optionally reject messages when UPIDs does not match IP.
Add support for file-based secrets
Allow isolators to inject task-specific environment variables.
Expose MOUNT volumes of an agent in master's v0 HTTP API
Support ambient capabilities.
Add an agent flag for executor re-registration timeout.
Add executor reconnection retry logic to the agent
Attach latest symlink when executor is registered.
Added 'mesos config show' command to the new Mesos CLI.
Protobuf definitions for domains
Protobuf definitions for region-aware framework capability
Support domains in master and agent
Prevent master from joining mixed-region cluster
Prevent agent with misconfigured domain from registering
Only offer resources on remote agents to region-aware frameworks
Add simple filtering to unversioned operator API
Add DomainInfo to offers
Add fetcher cache size metrics.
Add support for ECDH ciphers
Bundling gRPC into 3rdparty
Building gRPC with Autotools
gRPC support in libprocess
Improve the test frameworks.
Get rid of timestamp and date in generated javadoc files
Refactor libssl and libcrypto checks for building gRPC
Add Framwork events to master's operator API
Add support for cgroups blkio subsystem blkio statistics.
Display reservations in the agent page in the webui.
Support reservations for role subtrees
Add ability to initialize a test cluster for Mesos CLI unit-test infrastructure
Fetcher should not depend on SlaveID.
Design doc for resource provider and storage integration.
Enable authorization for master's logging API calls: GET_LOGGING_LEVEL  and SET_LOGGING_LEVEL
Add authorization to master's operator maintenance API in v0 and v1
Filter results of `/master/slaves` and the v1 call GET_AGENTS
Design doc for file-based secrets.
Set working directory in DEBUG containers.
Refactor containerizers to not depend on TaskInfo or ExecutorInfo
Add `--ip6` and `--ip6_discovery_command` flag to Mesos agent
Enable hierarchical roles
Add 'type' and 'name' to ResourceProviderInfo.
Add `--resource_provider_config_dir` flag to the agent.
Add master flag `--filter-gpu-resources={true|false}`
Add Config class to manage the Mesos CLI config file.
Update master to use resource provider IDs instead of agent ID in allocator calls.
Update offer handling in the master to consider local resource providers
Move website from svn to git
Create script to automate publishing website
Create a CI job to publish the website
DefautlExecutor needs to inform tasks about IP addresses
Add `HIERARCHICAL_ROLE` agent capability
Prevent hierarchical roles from being allocated resources from non-HIERARCHICAL_ROLE agents.
Framework API update for reservation refinement.
V0 Operator API update for reservation refinement.
Update authorization to handle reservation refinement.
Add tests for reservation refinement.
Update resource provider design in the master
Add --default_container_dns flag to the agent.
Optimize number of copies made in dispatch/defer mechanism
Update allocator to support updating agent total resources
Update master to handle updates to agent total resources
Make `net::IP` fields protected to allow for inheritance
Add `SUBSCRIBE` call handling to the resource provider manager
Add copy assignment operator to `net::IP::Network`
Support shared PID namespace.
The kill nested container call should provide ability to specify a signal.
Display task names in Alphanum pattern
Add documentation for AGENT_ADDED/AGENT_REMOVED events.
Document Mesos "check" feature.
Change legacy --with-network-isolator to --with-port-mapping-isolator
